## About me


Hiya! I am Shiying Xiao, a graduate student
in the [Department of Statistics](https://statistics.uconn.edu/)
at the [University of Connecticut](https://uconn.edu/) (UConn).
I also serve as a consultant with
[UConn Statistical Consulting Services](https://statsconsulting.uconn.edu/),
where I provide analytical and methodological support to
researchers across the university.
